item.title: About
item.description: Description of my work a exprience in software development operating systems, development environments, languages, databases I have worked on a variety of software projects mostly in the financial industry This includes: Realtime Applications (e.g a system that scores the users spending pattern and credit history in order to pre-approve and offer them an increase in their credit limit in real time) The Technology Stack Used: • Used Visual studio code on the Windows Subsystem for Linux for development • Database postgress & MongoDB • Apache Kafka and Java for real time event streaming and processing • Python for credit model scoring with (Tensorflow) • Deployed on OpenShift • Communication between different components was done via the Restful API • Used Git for version control • Used Jira for project management • Used Confluence for documentation • Used Bamboo for CI/CD • Used SonarQube for code quality • Used Grafana for monitoring • Docker for containerizartion Full Stack Web Development.
